price: 25. Zodat zij Allah niet aanbidden, Die het licht brengt wat in de hemelen en de aarde verborgen is, en weet wat jullie verbergen en openbaar maken.
arabic: أَلَّاۤ يَسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي يُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡخَبۡءَ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُخۡفُونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: allā yasjudū lillahi alladhī yukh'riju al-khaba-a fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wayaʿlamu mā tukh'fūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
